sql_text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_sandbox.techcrunch_feed_items (title TEXT, link TEXT, pub_date DATETIME, categories TEXT);

INSERT INTO agent_sandbox.techcrunch_feed_items (title, link, pub_date, categories) VALUES ('As AI data centers hit power limits, Peak XV backs Indian startup C2i to fix the bottleneck', 'https://techcrunch.com/2026/02/15/as-ai-data-centers-hit-power-limits-peak-xv-backs-indian-startup-c2i-to-fix-the-bottleneck/', '2026-02-16 01:00:00', 'Startups,AI,data centers');
SELECT categories AS trend_signal, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM agent_sandbox.techcrunch_feed_items WHERE DATE(pub_date) = '2026-02-16' GROUP BY categories ORDER BY article_count DESC LIMIT 1;
